name: Oyster Box Dinner with 3 friends and Sharks & Amazulu Players 4
description: The Oyster Box in Umhlanga is generously sponsoring a luxurious dinner where you will be joined by two Sharks and two Amazulu F.C. players. There will be four NFT dinner tickets up for auction. Each NFT ticket secures you a seat at the table, along with three of your friends. The dinner date will be selected in line with Covid protocols, to ensure the best experience possible.
